original: 東漢靈帝時任冀州刺史，曾試圖廢漢靈帝，改立合肥侯。但因靈帝欶收兵權，王芬舉事未果，畏罪自殺。
text: The Lingdi of the Eastern Han Dynasty was Jizhou governor when he tried to abolish the Han Lingdi and set up Hefeihou. However, because the Emperor Ling retreated his military power, Wang Fen failed to act and committed suicide in fear of sin.
